node.title: 3,000+ 3Node Pre-Registrations for Batch 3
node.excerpt: We have received a huge influx in pre-registrations for the Titan V2 3Node. Thank you!

node.title: 3Node Pre-Register Q2 Batch Closing Soon
node.excerpt: Pre-register before the 30th of June if you want to be included in the batch.

node.title: Q2 3Node Batch is Sold Out! Q3 Pre-registration is Live!
node.excerpt: After Tactical Investing covered our project, the Q2 Titan V2 3Node batch is offically sold out!
